rule: The response should contain more than the tag corresponding to the part of speech of the given word with additional text.
input: sentence: Breakfast is ready., word: Breakfast
complianceText:
The chatbot output provides two part-of-speech tags, "CC: verb" and "NN: breakfast".
1. The correct response should only include the part-of-speech tag without any additional explanation or words.
2. "CC: verb" is incorrect because "verb" is not an acceptable addition in the output according to the guidelines.
3. The appropriate output should have been just "CC" or "NN" without any additional information.

ERR
